question: In the Waman Rao case (1981), the Supreme Court held that the doctrine of the ‘basic structure’ would apply to constitutional amendments enacted after?
explanation: In the Waman Rao case (1981), the Supreme Court held that the doctrine of the ‘basic structure’ would apply to constitutional amendments enacted after April 24, 1973 which is the date of thejudgement in the Kesavananda Bharati case.
